Name: assign_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision to assign a given User Story to a specific Sprint.

Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific Worker to a specific Task.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary decision to include a Feature in the next Release Plan.

Name: set_user_story_priority
Description: Sets the priority of a User Story on a scale from 1 (lowest) to 5 (highest).

Name: estimate_user_story_points
Description: Sets the effort estimation for a User Story using a Fibonacci-like scale.

Name: adjust_team_size
Description: Sets the number of workers assigned to a Team.

Name: set_project_budget
Description: Allocates a specific financial budget to a Project.

Name: change_task_status
Description: Update the status of a Task (e.g.

Name: define_sprint_duration_in_weeks
Description: Sets the standard duration for all Sprints in weeks (e.g.

Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary decision to assign a Team to a Project.

Name: set_blocker_severity
Description: Sets the severity of a Blocker on a scale from 1 (low) to 4 (critical).

Name: prioritize_epic_in_backlog
Description: Sets the priority of an Epic on a scale from 1 (lowest) to 10 (highest).
